Package com.northeastern.labyrinth.Controller

Class Rulebook

java.lang.Object
com.northeastern.labyrinth.Controller.Rulebook
public class Rulebook extends Object
Represents the Rules and Constraint for this version of Labyrinth.

    gameOver(IRefereeState state, int passes, int numberOfRounds)

  • Constructor Details

      public Rulebook()

  • Method Details

    • validHomeTiles

      public static void validHomeTiles(IRefereeState state)
      Ensures the uniqueness and correctness of home tiles for each player in the referee state. A home tile is "correct" if it exists on an unslidable column/row of the maze board in state.

    • validGoalTiles

      public static void validGoalTiles(IRefereeState state)
      Ensures the correctness of goal tiles for each player in a referee state. A goal tile is correct if it exists on an unslidable column/row to the maze board in state.

    • isCoordinateFixed

      public static boolean isCoordinateFixed(IRefereeState state, Coordinate coordinate)
      Check if the given coordinate is a fixed coordinate (unslidable).
      Returns:
      true if the given coordinate is a fixed coordinate

    • isCoordinateFixed

      public static boolean isCoordinateFixed(Coordinate coordinate)
      Checks if the coordinates row and column index are even.

    • gameOver

      public static boolean gameOver(IRefereeState state, int passes, int numberOfRounds)
      Termination of a game is one of: - a player reaches its home after visiting its designated goal tile - all players that survive a round opt to pass - the referee has run 1000 rounds - No players are left in the game (kicked)

    • roundOver

      public static boolean roundOver(IRefereeState state, int passes)
      A Round is over if the following: - a player reaches its home after visiting its designated goal - Player List is empty after kicking out the last list. - All active players have opted to pass.

    • validTurn

      public static boolean validTurn(IRefereeState playerState, Optional<Action> turnToValidate)
      Returns whether a turn is valid. A turn is valid if it is: Empty A valid action

    • validAction

      public static boolean validAction(IPlayerState playerState, Action actionToValidate)
      A valid action must have: - valid slide - valid rotation - valid coordinate to move - Coordinate exist on the board. - Reachable coordinate from the current position.

    • getWinningCandidates

      public static List<IPlayer> getWinningCandidates(IRefereeState finalState)
      Calculates the list of winning players. A winning player(s) is one that has the highest tally of treasures accumulated. If there is a tie of treasures, the euclidean distance to the next target tile.
